message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $170.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $120.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $120 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $145.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the effort, I still need to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $130.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $140. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to try to meet you in the middle. How about I offer you the product for $137.50?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. Would you consider $135?
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than $138. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to try to meet you in the middle. How about I offer you the product for $136?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $134.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than $139. I'm willing to make one last adjustment to try to meet you in the middle. How about I offer you the product for $135.50?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to propose a final price of $134.5.
